channel.title: A lot of question about qubes+whinox
channel.description:
1. First off Does qubes and qubes+whinox hide REFERER and tracking pixels?
How does qubes and qubes+ whinox hide agansit browser fingerprinting, does it really depend on the browser you are using, if so what’s the safest browser to use that protect you from browser fingerprinting beside tor?
What should you do with qubes to safety open and shut it down For maximum anonymity?
Is there something I should check or do before downloading qubes to secure my anonymity with an pre owned refurbished computer I bought?

item.title: A lot of question about qubes+whinox
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Theoneandonly:
  1. First off Does qubes and qubes+whinox hide REFERER and tracking pixels?

How does qubes and qubes+ whinox hide agansit browser fingerprinting

Same as Tor Browser. See also:

  • Information Booster might be Available!
  • Whonix ™ Tor Browser Differences
Theoneandonly:

does it really depend on the browser you are using

Yes.

Theoneandonly:

if so what’s the safest browser to use that protect you from browser fingerprinting beside tor?

None.

Please kindly do not accidentally substitute Tor for a question related to Tor Browser, as this causes confusion.

Theoneandonly:

Is there something I should check or do before downloading qubes to secure my anonymity with an pre owned refurbished computer I bought?

This is a Whonix support forum.
General Qubes specific questions without relation to Qubes-Whonix are off-topic.

Also your writing style could get your de-anonymized. See:

Whonix – 3 Apr 21

Stylometry

Deanonymization based on a user's linguistic style.

Whonix – 2 Dec 21

Keystroke Deanonymization

deanonymization using user keystrokes, keystroke deanonymization, keystroke fingerprinting

Whonix – 2 Dec 21

Surfing Posting Blogging

Surf, Blog and Post anonymously on the Internet. Essential knowledge about Anonymous File Sharing, Keystroke / Mouse Fingerprinting and Stylometry risks. Tips for avoiding detection.

Read full topic
item.source: A lot of question about qubes+whinox
